title: HoP 121 - This is a Test - the Mutazilites
itunes:title: HoP 121 - This is a Test - the Mutazilites
description: A first look at the philosophical contributions of Islamic theology (kalām) and its political context, focusing on the Muʿtazilites Abū l-Hudhayl and al-Naẓẓām.
